it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.view

Class RemoteView

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.utils.Observable<ClientEvent>
      • it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.view.RemoteView

  • public class RemoteView
extends Observable<ClientEvent>
    This class represents the view on client side. It contains all of the information useful for the creation of the GUI.
    Author:
    Pietro L'Imperio

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Client client
      Matches the instance of remote view with the client owner of it.
      private InitializationView initializationView
      The reference to initialization view
      private boolean isMyTurn
      It states if the current turn is the turn of the client owner of this view
      private KillshotTrackView killshotTrackView
      The reference to killshot track view
      private java.util.ArrayList<PlayerBoardView> listOfPlayerBoardViews
      The list of the player board views for each player
      private MainFrame mainFrame
      The reference to the main frame
      private MapView mapView
      The reference to map view
      private PlayerBoardView myPlayerBoardView
      The reference to player board view of the client owner of the view
      private NetworkHandler networkHandler
      The reference to network handler
      private boolean terminatorMode
      It states if the game has terminator mode

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RemoteView(Client client, NetworkHandler networkHandler)
      It creates and instance of all the parts of the view and it matches them to the specific client that is passed by parameter.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RemoteView

        public RemoteView(Client client,
                  NetworkHandler networkHandler)
        It creates and instance of all the parts of the view and it matches them to the specific client that is passed by parameter.
        Parameters:
        client - the specific client to which to connect the other parts of view.
        networkHandler - the network handler connected with this specific remote view

    • Method Detail

      • handlePlayerBoardEvent

        public void handlePlayerBoardEvent(PlayerBoardEvent event)
        It handles a player board event updating (or creating) a reference in the list of player board view, avoiding to store power up cards of other players in order to respect the rules of the game.
        Parameters:
        event - The event handled in this method.

      • playerBoardViewAlreadyExists

        private boolean playerBoardViewAlreadyExists(java.lang.String nickname)
        Check if a player board view of some players already exists in the list of them.
        Parameters:
        nickname - The nickname of the player board involved to the control of its existence
        Returns:
        true if the player board view already exists, no otherwise.

      • removePowerUpCardsDeckFromEvent

        private void removePowerUpCardsDeckFromEvent(PlayerBoardEvent event)
        Remove power up cards from the deck in the player board view if this one is not the one of the client owner of this remote view.
        Parameters:
        event - The event that contains the information about the player board from it has to remove power up cards.

      • getPlayerBoardViewOfThisPlayer

        public PlayerBoardView getPlayerBoardViewOfThisPlayer(java.lang.String nickname)
        Get the player board view of the player with the nickname passed by parameter.
        Parameters:
        nickname - The nickname of the player owner of the player board returned
        Returns:
        The player board view of the player with the nickname passed by parameter.
